LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.label: Rice crafting spot
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.description: Work place to process agricultural crops and by-products.
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Blueprint.label: Rice crafting spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Frame.label: Rice crafting spot (building)
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Frame.description: Work place to process agricultural crops and by-products.
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith.label: Smithy
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith.description: A smithy place where old-fashioned Japanese weapons and armor can be produced.
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Blueprint.label: Smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Frame.label: Smithy (building)
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Frame.description: A smithy place where old-fashioned Japanese weapons and armor can be produced.
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace.label: 泥収集所
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace.description: \n【設置場所：泥、沼、浅瀬、沿岸流】土壌作りのための泥を集める場所。
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Blueprint.label: 泥収集所 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Frame.label: 泥収集所 (building)
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Frame.description: \n【設置場所：泥、沼、浅瀬、沿岸流】土壌作りのための泥を集める場所。
LanguageData.PaddyField.label: Paddy field
LanguageData.PaddyField.description: Paddy fields that can raise Semiaquatic rice. Fertility 200% It can only be installed in mud, wetlands and shallows, but because it has abundant moisture and nutrients, it is high performance compared to general purpose type.
LanguageData.PaddyField_Blueprint.label: Paddy field (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.label: Paddy field (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.description: Paddy fields that can raise Semiaquatic rice. Fertility 200% It can only be installed in mud, wetlands and shallows, but because it has abundant moisture and nutrients, it is high performance compared to general purpose type.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.label: Paddy field(Nomal type)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.description: Paddy fields that can raise Semiaquatic rice. Fertility 140%. Can be installed other than waterside.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Blueprint.label: Paddy field (blueprint) (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.label: Paddy field (blueprint) (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.description: Paddy fields that can raise Semiaquatic rice. Fertility 140%. Can be installed other than waterside.
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace.label: ミミズ収集場
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace.description: \n魚の餌や土壌開発用のミミズを捕まえる。
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace_Frame.label: ミミズ収集場 (building)
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace_Frame.descri: \n魚の餌や土壌開発用のミミズを捕まえる。
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet.label: 養殖網(3×3)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet.description:
【設置場所⇒浅瀬,沿岸流,沼,泥】
【餌⇒ミミズ,魚の餌,虫肉】
魚を育てることができる。
餌がなくなると生け簀を壊して脱走するので注意。
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Blueprint.label: 養殖網(3×3) (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Frame.label: 養殖網(3×3) (building)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Frame.description:
【設置場所⇒浅瀬,沿岸流,沼,泥】
【餌⇒ミミズ,魚の餌,虫肉】
魚を育てることができる。
餌がなくなると生け簀を壊して脱走するので注意。
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large.label: 養殖網(4×5)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large.description:
【設置場所⇒浅瀬,沿岸流,沼,泥】
【餌⇒ミミズ,魚の餌,虫肉】
魚を育てることができる。
餌がなくなると生け簀を壊して脱走するので注意。

LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel.label: 浮遊式太陽灯(燃料)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel.description: 【直径3マス】\n水田や養殖網に使える燃料式発熱太陽灯。\n燃料式なので範囲は狭く燃費効率は悪い。
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Blueprint.label: 浮遊式太陽灯(燃料) (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Frame.label: 浮遊式太陽灯(燃料) (building)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Frame.descriptio: 【直径3マス】\n水田や養殖網に使える燃料式発熱太陽灯。\n燃料式なので範囲は狭く燃費効率は悪い。
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp.label: 浮遊式太陽灯
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp.description: 水田や養殖網に使える太陽灯。夜になると自動で消灯する。
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Blueprint.label: 浮遊式太陽灯 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Frame.label: 浮遊式太陽灯 (building)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Frame.description: 水田や養殖網に使える太陽灯。夜になると自動で消灯する。
